name: MagicCardTrick
0:
”Alexa, start Magic Card Trick”
”Alexa, open Magic Card Trick”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: magic card trick
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Here's how it works
The ToyBot ™ will work with the Dealer to have a Player select a card. Based on the card that Player selects, the Dealer will give a SPECIFIC command to "guess" the card. For example, if the Player selected the Ace of Clubs, the Dealer would say, “What card was chosen? Alternatively, if Player selected the Two of Clubs, the Dealer would say, "Which card was selected?"

How did the dealer know what to say? Notice the underlined words in and use the simple key below:

Keys
------------------------------------

Number
1/A. What...
2. Which...
3. Guess what...
4. Guess which...
5. Let us know what...
6. Let us know which...
7. Reveal what...
8. Reveal which…
9. Say what 
10. Say which
J. Tell us what...
Q. Tell us which....
K. Can you tell us what…
Joker: Can you tell us which…

Suit
Spades - ...card was selected
Clubs - ...card was chosen
Diamonds - ...Card was drawn
Hearts - ...card was picked - Think “hand picked”

About SayKid
SayKid combines voice technology with tangible play to help kids learn in an actively-engaging way - without screens! SayKid won the Grand Prize in the Amazon Alexa EdTech Challenge, has been recognized by Harvard, and was the subject of a recent TEDx Talk: “Can a Toy Robot Transform Education?”

For more screen-free educational experiences, search "SayKid" on the Alexa Skill Store. If you enjoyed this game, we’d really appreciate it if you could take a moment to leave us a review!
priv:
